Class DatabaseCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseCommunicator

  • public class DatabaseCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class to handle the additional functionality offered by storing the AppointmentBook objects in a database.
    Author:
    14061121

    • Method Detail

      • AddAppointmentToDatabase

        public static void AddAppointmentToDatabase(java.lang.String tableName,
                            Appointment appointment)
        Method to add a new entry into the DB representing an Appointment for a given AppointmentBook. Each AppointmentBook has its own table in the DB. Each appointment is then stored in it's respective AppointmentBook. THIS METHOD IS BUGGY: it seems that the function doesn't successfully add Appointments to tables which have punctuation in (e.g '.' or ',' such as [Test.ics] table names). Needs further development to isolate the problem.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table representing the relevant AppointmentBook.
        appointment - the Appointment object to be stored in the DB.

      • RemoveAppointmentFromDatabase

        public static void RemoveAppointmentFromDatabase(java.lang.String tableName,
                                 Appointment appointment)
        Method to remove a given Appointment record from an AppointmentBook table. THIS METHOD IS BUGGY: I'm not certain if finding the relevant Appointment record should be done just using the Appointment objects eventTitle field. What if there is a repeated event with the same name but different times???
        Parameters:
        tableName - the AppointmentBook's name representing the table in question.
        appointment - the Appointment object to remove.

      • GetAllAppointmentsFromDatabase

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> GetAllAppointmentsFromDatabase(java.lang.String BookName)
        Method to fetch all Appointment records stored in the DB for a given AppointmentBook.
        Parameters:
        BookName - the AppointmentBook to get all the stored Appointment records for.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Appointment objects.

      • GetSpecificAppointmentFromDatabase

        public static void GetSpecificAppointmentFromDatabase(java.lang.String BookName,
                                      Appointment appointment)
        Method to return a specific Appointment record stored in the DB.
        Parameters:
        BookName - the name of the AppointmentBook table to search in.
        appointment - the Appointment object to find records for.

      • CheckIfAppointmentBookExistsOnDatabase

        public static boolean CheckIfAppointmentBookExistsOnDatabase(java.lang.String BookName)
        Method to return a boolean value determining if an AppointmentBook is already represented on the DB by its appointmentBookName.
        Parameters:
        BookName - the appointmentBookName to search for.
        Returns:
        true is the AppointmentBook object is represented on the DB, otherwise false.

      • SetupNewAppointmentBookForDatabase

        public static void SetupNewAppointmentBookForDatabase(java.lang.String tableName)
        Method to create a new table for an AppointmentBook using its appointmentBookName string to label it.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the desired name of the AppointmentBook.

      • RemoveAppointmentBookFromDatabase

        public static void RemoveAppointmentBookFromDatabase(java.lang.String tableName)
        Method to remove a given AppointmentBook table from the DB.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the appointmentBookName used to represent the table.

      • GetAllAppointmentBooks

        public static void GetAllAppointmentBooks(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> bookNames)
        Method to return all AppointmentBooks currently represented by tables in the DB.
        Parameters:
        bookNames - the ArrayList to return the results of the query in.
